attributes.action: Hold an election on the 12th December 2019
attributes.additional_details: when I contacted my MP regarding present issues in the House of Commons I received a written lecture that implied to me the only concern he had was his own personal goals.  This is being repeated throughout the county.
attributes.background: The people of this country have no voice to show how much we need an election to break the grid lock in parliament and to get this country working again.  The only voice we have is our MPs and many are ignoring their constituents.
